Text: A Whole New Way to ShopDear Barrie Pace Customer Because you have supplied us with your email address in the past we thought youd like to receive this exciting news With the introduction of our Brand New website our preferred customers will enjoy occasional email updates about special offers product information and other news events If you would prefer not to receive these email announcements please click on the unsubscribe link below Make sure to visit our new website where youll find a wonderful selection of sophisticated apparel and accessories for Misses Petites and Womens Youll fall in love with our fresh take on classic styling and fine fabrics that are superbly tailored and designed with impeccable attention to detail See you online Please click here to unsubscribe slinkunsubrcuerticsir Barrie Pace One Executive Way Forrester Center WV
